name: Sleeping States 7" single  I Wonder/Under A Capricorn Sky
description:
The debut Caspian label double A-side single features ‘I Wonder’ from the forthcoming Sleeping States album ‘There the Open Spaces’ It also features the brand new and  exclusive track “Under A Capricorn Sky”and comes in a stunning foiled block white on white 7” sleeve

	limited to 500 copies

name: Mike Wexler 7" single - Axis, Road of Awe
description: The second Caspian label single’s A-side is the stunning ‘Axis, Road of Awe’ from Mike Wexler’s debut album ‘Sun Wheel’ which was released on the venerable New York based Amish Records this year. It also features an exclusive previously unreleased track ‘Glyph’ and comes in the same exquisite white on white 7” sleeve, which is part of the series of 7 introductory caspian singles limited to 500 copies each.

name: The Soft Pack 7" single -Nightlife
description:
The third Caspian label single is a very exciting addition to the series: For a band whose lineup has only really been cemented this year, The Soft Pack – formerly known as the Muslims – have already accomplished a breathtaking amount. Raised in San Diego but currently based in LA, the quartet, which features Matt Lamkin on vocals, co-founder Matty McLoughlin on guitar, David Lantzman on bass and Brian Hill on drums, create a fresh, razor-sharp, no-frills sound that draws in influences from acts as varied as the Stooges, Jonathan Richman, Wire and The Velvet Underground, resulting in fiercely infectious, stripped-down songs 
Nightlife is their debut UK release and comes in the same exquisite white on white 7” sleeve, which is part of the series of 7 introductory caspian singles limited to 500 copies each.

Only ONE ORDER per person please
